name: Little Shooter Game
description:
In this simple but fun game you are simple turret in an infinite void that is under the constant attack of Evil Blocks, why are they evil? Who knows! All you know is that they are square and are definitely out to get you!
Features:

 - A lonely circle!

 - Oddly shaped bullets!

 - A convenient pointer arrow!

 - A random score tracker that is way too small!

- And finally: Squares of evil intent!

Use the mouse to aim and click to shoot! How high of a score can you get?
